--- the_jigglin_penguin
<the_jigglin_penguin@...> wrote:
---------------------------------
I was wondering if anyone new were i could find out
more info on
samurai battle plans and strategy. 

Hi

you could start with two books that are not too
expensive

Nagashino 1575 - S Turnbull
Sekigahara 1600 - A Bryant.

Both are excellent description of the battles with
maps and plans of the areas and formations used by the
armies involved.

paul
